column2: Giles shook the last hand and
column4: walked down the road to join the dock workers in the Lord Nelson.|Mightier Than the Sword|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 22:01|In the old school they use now for the Village Hall
column2: below the clock that has stood always at one minute past ten
column3: hangs a small dusty painting of a horse.|War Horse|Michael Morpurgo

column2: as soon as the corporal had conducted my uncle Toby upstairs
column3: which was about 10 - Mrs. Wadman threw herself into her arm chair|The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy
